title: Cannot accept matches and now I am receiving penalties, please help
body: When I que for matches, the orange box to accept matches never comes up and now I am receiving -10 LP and a 30:00 que time each time this happens.  Is this a bug or a connection problem? I have never had this problem before and have been playing league for over a year now.

replies.body:
Missing queue popups are typically caused by a *poor connection* to the PvP.net service, which is the service that pops up that window. I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if those steps helped.
